mcq.statement: Which countries does the Himalayan Mountain Range pass through?

options.a: Pakistan, Nepal, Bhutan, China, and India
options.b: Pakistan, Afghanistan, Iran, China, and India
options.c: Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, China, and India
options.d: Pakistan, Nepal, Bhutan, Afghanistan, and India

mcq.one_liner: The Himalayan Mountain Range stretches across **Pakistan, Nepal, Bhutan, China, and India**.
